2009-10 season General information Manager Carlo Ancelotti Captain John Terry Performance Premier League Winners FA Cup Winners League Cup 5th Round Europe Round of 16 Top scorers League Didier Drogba (29) FA Cup Daniel Sturridge (4) League Cup Salomon Kalou (3) Europe Anelka, Drogba, Kalou (3) Overall Didier Drogba (37) Attendances Highest 41,836 Lowest 37,781

2010-11 season→

The 2009-10 season was Chelsea's 105th season of football since they were established.
